授業目的: The purpose of this course to help students improve their overall English reading skills. Students will improve their comprehension (ability to understand) of different English texts. This includes learning and practicing different reading strategies, such as skimming, scanning, and predicting. Students will also learn and use other skills to improve their understanding of English texts, including summarizing. Students will learn about how texts are organized and their parts. Readings will include different types of texts about a variety of interesting topics. To help in overall understanding of course readings, there will be a focus on improving vocabulary. Students will learn important new words and phrases needed to understand readings.
到達目標:
• Students will improve their overall ability to read and understand English texts.
• Students will improve their oral reading skills (reading out loud). This will include improving reading fluency, pronunciation, intonation and stress, and rhythm.
• Students will improve their comprehension (ability to understand) of English texts.
• Students will learn about and use different reading. Some of these include skimming, scanning, making inferences, predicting, and summarizing.
• Students will improve their vocabulary knowledge. Key words and phrases will be learned to help with comprehension.
• Students will learn about the parts and organization of English texts. Students will learn how to identify the parts of different English texts.
• Students will improve their critical thinking skills of text topics through discussion questions and other tasks.
• Students will improve their cooperative skills (ability to work with others).
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
